Sentencas: In this work, TiO2 was selected as an additive to the Sm0.2Ce0.8O2-delta (SDC) electrolyte and its influence on the electrolyte properties were investigated.
Titulo: Effect of TiO2 as an additive on the sintering performance of Sm-doped CeO2-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The tetrabutyl titanate hydrolysis product was introduced into the SDC samples as a source of TiO2.
Titulo: Effect of TiO2 as an additive on the sintering performance of Sm-doped CeO2-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The lattice contraction of SDC was observed by XRD when the smaller ionic radius Ti4+ (0.605 & ANGS;) were substituted for Ce4+
Titulo: Effect of TiO2 as an additive on the sintering performance of Sm-doped CeO2-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells
Effect of TiO2 as an additive on the sintering performance of Sm-doped CeO2-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: XRD analysis shows that the doping content of the TiO2 in SDC should be limited to 1 wt% to maintain the single-phase cubic fluorite structure of the SDC and avoid impurity phases.
Titulo: Effect of TiO2 as an additive on the sintering performance of Sm-doped CeO2-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: SEM characterizations suggest that the addition of TiO2 significantly promoted the grain growth and the sintering activity, especially when doping with 0.5 wt% of TiO2.
Titulo: Effect of TiO2 as an additive on the sintering performance of Sm-doped CeO2-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical measurements reveal that the addition of TiO2 had little effect on the conductivity of SDC samples, which was 0.0306 S cm(-1) at 700 & DEG;C. This study shows that 0.5 wt% TiO2 doping can effectively improve the sintering activity without reducing the SDC performance.
Titulo: Effect of TiO2 as an additive on the sintering performance of Sm-doped CeO2-based electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells
